2795 /**
2796  * Mouse takes care for the buttons, and for the cursor position. baa.mouse is of the type baa.point, allowing you to check overlap with rectangles.
2797  */
2798 baa.mouse = baa.point.new();
2799 
2800 /**
2801  * The buttons of the mouse. Each button is it's own object so that it can be set true or false, when it's down or not.
2802  */
2803 baa.mouse._buttons = [];
2804 
2805 /**
2806  * An array of all the buttons that are pressed.
2807  */
2808 baa.mouse._pressed = [];
2809 
2810 /**
2811  * An array of all the buttons that are released.
2812  */
2813 baa.mouse._released = [];
2814 
2815 /**
2816  * The names of all the keys with their corresponding keycode.
2817  */
2818 baa.mouse._constant = {
2819 	0:"l",
2820 	1:"m",
2821 	2:"r",
2822 	4:"wu",
2823 	5:"wd"
2824 };
2825 
2826 /**
2827  * This is called everything the mouse is moved.
2828  * @param  {object} event The Event object.
2829  */
2830 baa.mouse._move = function (event) {
2831 	baa.mouse.x = event.clientX-4;
2832 	baa.mouse.y = event.clientY-9;
2833 }
2834 
2835 /**
2836  * This is called everything a mouse button is clicked.
2837  * @param  {object} event The Event object.
2838  */
2839 baa.mouse._downHandler = function (event) {
2840 	var mousepressed = baa.mouse._constant[event.button];
2841 	if (!baa.mouse._buttons[mousepressed]) {
2842 		baa.mouse._pressed.push(mousepressed);
2843 		if (baa.mousepressed) {
2844 			baa.mousepressed(mousepressed,event.clientX,event.clientY);
2845 		}
2846 		if (baa.debug) {
2847 			baa.debug.mousepressed(mousepressed,event.clientX,event.clientY)
2848 		}
2849 	}
2850 	baa.mouse._buttons[mousepressed] = true;
2851 }
2852 
2853 /**
2854  * This is called everything a mouse button is released.
2855  * @param  {object} event The Event object.
2856  */
2857 baa.mouse._upHandler = function (event) {
2858 	var mousereleased = baa.mouse._constant[event.button];
2859 	if (baa.mouse._buttons[mousereleased]) {
2860 		baa.mouse._released.push(mousereleased);
2861 		if (baa.mousereleased) {
2862 			baa.mousereleased(mousereleased,event.clientX,event.clientY);
2863 		}
2864 	}
2865 	baa.mouse._buttons[mousereleased] = false;
2866 }
2867 
2868 /**
2869  * This is called everything the mousewheel is scrolled.
2870  * @param  {object} event The Event object.
2871  */
2872 baa.mouse._wheelHandler = function (event) {
2873 	var mousepressed = baa.mouse._constant[event.wheelDelta > 0 ? 4 : 5];
2874 	if (!baa.mouse._buttons[mousepressed]) {
2875 		baa.mouse._pressed.push(mousepressed);
2876 		if (baa.mousepressed) {
2877 			baa.mousepressed(mousepressed,event.clientX,event.clientY);
2878 		}
2879 		if (baa.debug) {
2880 			baa.debug.mousepressed(mousepressed,event.clientX,event.clientY)
2881 		}
2882 	}
2883 }
2884

2886  * Returns the horizontal position of the mouse.

2888  */
2889 baa.mouse.getX = function () {
2890 	return this.x;
2891 }

2894  * Returns the vertical position of the mouse.

2897 baa.mouse.getY = function () {

2949 /**
2950  * Removes the given button from the list of pressed buttons. Useful for when you want to click on something, and not have something behind that affected by it.
2951  * @param  {string} button The button you want to remove
2952  */
2953 baa.mouse.catchPressed = function (button) {
2954 	baa._checkType("button",button,"string");
2955 	for (var i = 0; i < this._pressed.length; i++) {
2956 		if (button == this._pressed[i]) {
2957 			this._pressed.splice(i,1);
2958 			break;
2959 		}
2960 	}
2961 }
2962 
2963 /**
2964  * Removes the given button from the list of released buttons. Useful for when you want to click on something, and not have something behind that affected by it.
2965  * @param  {string} button The button you want to remove
2966  */
2967 baa.mouse.catchReleased = function (button) {
2968 	baa._checkType("button",button,"string");
2969 	for (var i = 0; i < this._released.length; i++) {
2970 		if (button == this._released[i]) {
2971 			this._released.splice(i,1);
2972 			break;
2973 		}
2974 	}
2975 }

2983 	document.getElementById("canvas").style.cursor=cursor;

3014 /**

3086 baa.run = function () {
3087 		window.requestAnimFrame = (function(){
3088 		return  window.requestAnimationFrame   ||  //Chromium 
3089 			window.webkitRequestAnimationFrame ||  //Webkit
3090 			window.mozRequestAnimationFrame    || //Mozilla Geko
3091 			window.oRequestAnimationFrame      || //Opera Presto
3092 			window.msRequestAnimationFrame     || //IE Trident?
3093 			function(callback, element){ //Fallback function
3094 				window.setTimeout(callback, 1000/60);                
3095 			}
3096 		})();
3097 		
3098 		window.cancelAnimFrame = window.cancelAnimationFrame || window.mozCancelAnimationFrame;
3099 	
3100 	if (baa._assetsLoaded == baa._assetsToBeLoaded) {
3101 		if (baa.graphics.ctx) {
3102 			if (baa.config) {
3103 				var conf = {};
3104 				baa.config(conf);
3105 				baa.graphics.canvas.width = conf.width != null ? conf.width : 800;
3106 				baa.graphics.canvas.height = conf.height != null ? conf.height : 600;
3107 				baa.graphics.width = baa.graphics.canvas.width;
3108 				baa.graphics.height = baa.graphics.canvas.height;
3109 				baa.filesystem.identity = typeof(conf.identity) == "string" ? conf.identity + "/" : null;
3110 				if (conf.release) {
3111 					baa.debug = null;
3112 					baa.typesafe = false;
3113 				}
3114 			}
3115 			baa.graphics.imageSmoothingEnabled = true;
3116 			baa.graphics.ctx.strokeStyle = baa.graphics._rgb(255,255,255);
3117 			baa.graphics.setFont(baa.graphics.newFont("arial",10));
3118 			baa.load();
3119 			baa.loop(0);
3120 			window.cancelAnimFrame(baa.run);
3121 		}
3122 		else {
3123 			window.requestAnimFrame(baa.run);
3124 		}
3125 	}
3126 	else {
3127 		window.requestAnimFrame(baa.run);
3128 	}
3129 }

3131 /**
3132  * The main loop. Calls baa.update, and baa.graphics.drawLoop. It also calls baa.debug.update if baa.debug is activated.
3133  */
3134 baa.loop = function (time) {
3135 	baa._time.dt = (baa._time.stamp() - baa._time.last) / 1000;
3136 	ot = (baa._time.dt > 0) ? baa._time.dt : 1/60;
3137 	dt = Math.min(ot,1/60);
3138 
3139 	if (baa.debug) {
3140 		baa.debug.fps = 1000 / (baa._time.stamp() - baa._time.last);
3141 		baa.debug.update();
3142 	}
3143 
3144 	if (baa.update) {
3145 		baa.mouse.setCursor("default");
3146 		baa.update();
3147 		Timer.update();
3148 		Tween.update();
3149 	}
3150 
3151 	if (baa.debug) {
3152 		baa.debug.updateWindows();
3153 	}
3154 
3155 	baa.graphics._drawloop();
3156 
3157 	baa.keyboard._pressed = [];
3158 	baa.keyboard._released = [];
3159 	baa.mouse._pressed = [];
3160 	baa.mouse._released = [];
3161 
3162 	baa._time.last = baa._time.stamp();
3163 	window.requestAnimFrame(baa.loop);
3164 }

3172 		this.ctx.fillStyle = this._rgb(this._backgroundColor.r,this._backgroundColor.g,this._backgroundColor.b);
3173 		this.ctx.globalAlpha = 1;
3174 		this.clear();
3175 		this.ctx.globalAlpha = this._color.a;
3176 		this.ctx.fillStyle = this._rgb(this._color.r,this._color.g,this._color.b);
3177 		this.ctx.strokeStyle = this._rgb(this._color.r,this._color.g,this._color.b);
3178 		this.setFont(this.newFont("arial",10));
3179 		baa.draw();
3180 
3181 		if (baa.debug) {
3182 			baa.debug.draw();
3183 		}
3184 	}

3193 //////////
3194 ///ONCE///
3195 //////////
3196 
3197 /**
3198  * A small tool to lock functions to 1 call. They won't be called again until they are unlocked.
3199  * @constructor
3200  * @property {object} object The object of this instance.
3201  * @property {object} list A list of all the functions, and their current state.
3202  * @param {object} obj The object of this instance.
3203  * @example
3204  * this.once = baa.once.new(this);
3205  *
3206  * Foo.update = function () {
3207  * 		//This is only called once
3208  * 		this.once.do("foo");
3209  *
3210  * 		//If a is pressed
3211  * 		if (baa.keyboard.isPressed("a")) {
3212  *
3213  * 			//this.foo can be called again, this.bar is called.
3214  * 			this.once.back("foo","bar");
3215  * 		}
3216  * }
3217  */
3218 baa.once = Class.extend("baa.once");
3219 
3220 baa.once.init = function (obj) {
3221 	baa._checkType("object",obj,"object");
3222 
3223 	this.object = obj;
3224 	this.list = {};
3225 }
3226 
3227 /**
3228  * Call a function. If it has already been called with this function, it won't be called again.
3229  * @param  {string} f    The function to call.
3230  * @param  {array} args An array of arguments to use with the function.
3231  * @return {dynamic} If the function is called, returns whatever the given function returns. Else, returns null.
3232  */
3233 baa.once.do = function (f,args) {
3234 	baa._checkType("function",f,"string");
3235 	baa._checkType("arguments",args,"object");
3236 
3237 	if (!this.list[f]) {
3238 		this.list[f] = true;
3239 		return this.object[f].apply(this.object,args);
3240 	}
3241 	return;
3242 }
3243 
3244 /**
3245  * Allow a function to be called again. You can give a new function that will be called.
3246  *  The new function will not be locked, but won't be called by this function if f is already reverted.
3247  * @param  {string} f    The function you want to unlock.
3248  * @param  {string} [nf]   The function you want call when f is unlocked.
3249  * @param  {array} [args] An array of arguments to use with the function.
3250  * @return {dynamic} If nf is called, returns whatever nf returns. Else, returns null.
3251  */
3252 baa.once.back = function (f,nf,args) {
3253 	baa._checkType("function",f,"string");
3254 	baa._checkType("newFunction",nf,"string");
3255 	baa._checkType("arguments",args,"object");
3256 
3257 	if (this.list[f]) {
3258 		delete(list[f]);
3259 		if (nf) {
3260 			return this.object[nf].apply(this.object,args);
3261 		}
3262 		else {
3263 			return true;
3264 		}
3265 	}
3266 	return;
3267 }

3302 				return true;

3310 					if (arr[i][key] == f[key]) {

3450 baa.util.getAngle = function (a,b,c,d) {
3451 	baa._checkType("x1",a,"number");
3452 	baa._checkType("y1",b,"number");
3453 	baa._checkType("x2",c,"number");
3454 	baa._checkType("y2",d,"number");
3455 
3456 	if (!c) {
3457 		return Math.atan2(b.y - a.y,b.x - a.x);
3458 	}
3459 	else {
3460 		return Math.atan2(d - b, c - a);
3461 	}

3464 baa.util.getDistance = function (a,b,c,d) {
3465 	if (typeof(a) === "object") {
3466 		baa._checkType("x1",a,"object");
3467 		baa._checkType("y1",b,"object");
3468 		c = b.x;
3469 		d = b.y;
3470 		b = a.y;
3471 		a = a.x;
3472 	}
3473 	else {
3474 		baa._checkType("x2",c,"number");
3475 		baa._checkType("y2",d,"number");
3476 	}
3477 
3478 	return Math.sqrt(Math.pow(a-c,2) + Math.pow(b-d,2));
3479 }

3489 		return s+Math.floor(Math.random()*(e-s+1));

3531 ///////////
3532 // Group //
3533 ///////////
3534 
3535 /**
3536  * A tool to make groups, saves you from writing arrays.
3537  * @constructor
3538  * @example
3539  * this.enemies = baa.group.new();
3540  * this.enemies.add( Enemy.new(), Enemy.new(), Enemy.new() );
3541  *
3542  * this.enemies.update();
3543  *
3544  * this.enemies.draw();
3545  * @property {number} length How many members are in the group.
3546  * @param {object|array} [...] The objects you want to add to the group. Can also be added with baa.group.add(). 
3547  * If the first argument is an array, it will use the objects in the array, and disregard all other arguments.
3548  */
3549 baa.group = Class.extend("baa.group");
3550 
3551 //Use .other if you want obj A to apply to obj B and vise versa
3552 //Use .one if you want obj B to apply to obj A only if obj A applied to obj B returns false
3553 
3554 /**
3555  * Using this as first argument when calling a function, will loop through all objects, and gives every other object as argument.
3556  * @example
3557  * this.rects = baa.group.new(baa.entity.new(100,100,200,200),baa.entity.new(50,50,100,100),baa.entity.new(300,200,10,40));
3558  * this.rects.resolveCollision(baa.group.others);
3559  */
3560 baa.group.others = "__GroupOthers";
3561 
3562 /**
3563  * Same as baa.group.others, except this will first call A with B as argument, and if A returns true, it will not call B with A as argument.
3564  */
3565 baa.group.one = "__GroupOne";
3566 
3567 /**
3568  * Make baa.group loop forwards through the objects. Normally the objects loop backwards, but you can revert that with this argument. 
3569  * Useful for when you want to update something you want to draw as last, so that it's on top.
3570  */
3571 baa.group.forward = "_GroupForward";
3572 
3573 baa.group.init = function () {
3574 	this.length = 0;
3575 	baa.group.add.apply(this,arguments);
3576 }
3577 
3578 /**
3579  * Add objects to the group. It will copy and modify it's functions so that it can be called by this. 
3580  *	@param {object|array} ... The objects you want to add to the group. If the first argument is an array, it will use the objects in the array, 
3581  *	and disregard all other arguments.
3582  */
3583 baa.group.add = function (obj) {
3584 	if (obj) {
3585 		if (arguments.length > 1) {
3586 			for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
3587 				this[this.length] = arguments[i];
3588 				this.length++;
3589 				for (var key in arguments[i]) {
3590 					if (!this.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
3591 						if (typeof(arguments[i][key]) == "function") {
3592 							this._makeFunc(key);
3593 						}
3594 					}
3595 				}
3596 			}
3597 		}
3598 		else if (Class.isClass(obj) && obj.is(baa.group)) {
3599 			for (var i=0; i < obj.length; i++) {
3600 				this[this.length] = obj[i];
3601 				this.length++;
3602 				for (var key in obj[i]) {
3603 					if (!this.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
3604 						if (typeof(obj[i][key]) == "function") {
3605 							this._makeFunc(key);
3606 						}
3607 					}
3608 				}
3609 			}
3610 		}
3611 		else {
3612 			this[this.length] = obj;
3613 			this.length++;
3614 			for (var key in obj) {
3615 				if (!this.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
3616 					if (typeof(obj[key]) == "function") {
3617 						this._makeFunc(key);
3618 					}
3619 				}
3620 			}
3621 		}
3622 	}
3623 }
3624 
3625 /**
3626  * Removes an object from the group.
3627  * @param  {obj|number} obj Can be the object itself, or its current position in the group.
3628  */
3629 baa.group.remove = function (obj) {
3630 	baa._checkType("object",obj,"number","object");
3631 
3632 	if (obj == null) { return false; }
3633 	var dead;
3634 	if (typeof(obj) == "object") {
3635 		for (var i=0; i < this.length; i++) {
3636 			if (this[i] == obj) {
3637 				dead = i;
3638 				break;
3639 			}
3640 		}
3641 		this[dead] = null;
3642 	}
3643 	else {
3644 		this[obj] = null;
3645 		dead = obj;
3646 	}
3647 	for (var i = dead+1; i < this.length; i++) {
3648 		this[i-1] = this[i];
3649 	}
3650 	this.length--;
3651 	this[this.length] = null;
3652 }
3653 
3654 /**
3655  * Modifies the function so that it calls the function for all the members.
3656  * @param  {string} k The function name
3657  */
3658 baa.group._makeFunc = function (k) {
3659 	this[k] = function () {
3660 		var other = arguments[0]
3661 		if (other == baa.group.others || other == baa.group.one) {
3662 			for (var i=0; i < this.length-1; i++) {
3663 				for (var j=i; j < this.length; j++) {
3664 					if (i!=j) {
3665 						if (this[i].hasOwnProperty(k) && this[j].hasOwnProperty(k)) {
3666 							arguments[0] = this[j];
3667 							var a = this[i][k].apply(this[i],arguments);
3668 							if (other == baa.group.one) {
3669 								continue;
3670 							}
3671 							var b = this[j][k].apply(this[j],arguments);
3672 						}
3673 					}
3674 				}
3675 			}
3676 		}
3677 		else {
3678 			if (arguments[0] == baa.group.forward) {
3679 				for (var i=0; i < this.length; i++) {
3680 					if (this[i].hasOwnProperty(k)) {
3681 						this[i][k].apply(this[i],arguments);
3682 					}
3683 				}
3684 			}
3685 			else {
3686 				for (var i = this.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
3687 					if (this[i].hasOwnProperty(k)) {
3688 						this[i][k].apply(this[i],arguments);
3689 					}
3690 				}	
3691 			}
3692 			
3693 			
3694 		}
3695 	}
3696 }
3697 
3698 /**
3699  * Make all the objects in the group call a function.
3700  * @param  {function} f The function you want to call.
3701  */
3702 baa.group.do = function (f) {
3703 	baa._checkType("function",f,"function");
3704 
3705 	for (var i=0; i < this.length; i++) {
3706 		func.call(this[i]);
3707 	}
3708 }
3709 
3710 /**
3711  * Sets a value to the given variable for all members. The object is required to already have this property.
3712  * @param {string} key   The property you want to change.
3713  * @param {dynamic} value The value you want to give the property.
3714  */
3715 baa.group.set = function (key,value) {
3716 	baa._checkType("key",key,"string");
3717 
3718 	for (var i = 0; i < this.length; i++) {
3719 		if (this[i].hasOwnProperty(key)) {
3720 			this[i][key] = value;
3721 		}
3722 	}
3723 }
3724 
3725 /**
3726  * Prepares the group for objects to come. Allowing you to already call its functions, without any members.
3727  * @example
3728  * this.group = baa.group.new();
3729  *
3730  * //This will give an error. this.group doesn't have .update().
3731  * this.group.update()
3732  *
3733  * this.group = baa.group.new();
3734  * this.group.prepare(baa.entity);
3735  *
3736  * //The group is prepared and can now already call functions without errors.
3737  * this.group.update();
3738  * @param  {object} obj An object with the functions the group is going to use.
3739  */
3740 baa.group.prepare = function (obj) {
3741 	for (var key in obj) {
3742 		if (!this.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
3743 			if (typeof(obj[key]) == "function") {
3744 				this._makeFunc(key);
3745 			}
3746 		}
3747 	}
3748 }
3749 
3750 /**
3751  * Removes all the members of the group, but keeps the functions.
3752  */
3753 baa.group.flush = function () {
3754 	for (var i=0; i < this.length; i++) {
3755 		delete(this[i]); 
3756 	}
3757 	this.length = 0;
3758 }
3759 
3760 /**
3761  * Sorts all the members on the value of a property. If an object in the group does not own the property, it will be taken as 0.
3762  * @param  {string} key         The property you want to sort on.
3763  * @param  {boolean} [highToLow] Set to true if you want the object to sort from high to low, instead of low to high.
3764  */
3765 baa.group.sort = function (a,highToLow) {
3766 	baa._checkType("key",a,"string");
3767 	baa._checkType("highToLow",highToLow,"boolean");
3768 
3769 	sorted = false;
3770 
3771 	var danger = 10000;
3772 	var propA, propB;
3773 
3774 	while (!sorted && danger > 0) {
3775 		danger--;
3776 		sorted = true;
3777 		for (var i = 0; i < this.length-1; i++) {
3778 			for (var j = i; j < this.length; j++) {
3779 				propA = this[i].hasOwnProperty(a) ? this[i][a] : 0;
3780 				propB = this[j].hasOwnProperty(a) ? this[j][a] : 0;
3781 				if (highToLow) {
3782 					if (propA < propB) {
3783 						var old = this[j];
3784 						this[j] = this[i];
3785 						this[i] = old;
3786 						sorted = false;
3787 					}
3788 				}
3789 				else {
3790 					if (propA > propB) {
3791 						var old = this[j];
3792 						this[j] = this[i];
3793 						this[i] = old;
3794 						sorted = false;
3795 					}
3796 				}
3797 			}
3798 		}
3799 	}
3800 }

3806 /**
3807  * A manager for baa.timer objects. Automatically updates and removes timers made with it.
3808  * @constructor
3809  * @see  baa.timer
3810  * @property {object} obj The object that owns this timermanager. Functions will be called with the object as this. 
3811  * @property {array} timers A list of all the timers owned by this timermanager.
3812  * @property {boolean} playing All the timers will only update when this is true.
3813  * @param {object} [object] The owner of this timermanager.
3814  */
3815 baa.timerManager = Class.extend("baa.timerManager");
3816 
3817 baa.timerManager.init = function (object) {
3818 	baa._checkType("object",object,"object",null);
3819 	this.obj = object;
3820 	this.timers = [];
3821 	this.playing = true;
3822 	this.new = this.newTimer;
3823 	delete(this.newTimer);
3824 }

3826 /**
3827  * Sets an object to this timermanager.
3828  * @param {object} object The object you want to set to this timermanager.
3829  */

3831 	baa._checkType("object",object,"object");
3832 	this.obj = object;
3833 }
3834 
3835 /**
3836  * Returns the object set to this timermanager.
3837  * @return {object} The object set to this timermanager.
3838  */
3839 baa.timerManager.getObject = function () {
3840 	return this.obj;
3841 }

3843 /**
3844  * Create a new timer belonging to this timer manager.
3845  * @alias new
3846  * @param  {object} [obj] The object you want to connect to the condition and function of this timer.
3847  * If the first argument is a number, this will be taken as the argument time, and shift all other arguments, and the manager's object will be used instead.
3848  * @param  {number} time The length of the timer in seconds.
3849  * @param  {string} [mode="normal"] If the timer should loop, die after one loop, or neither. Options: "loop", "once", "normal".
3850  * @param  {function|string} [func] The function you want to call each time the timer is finished. 
3851  * This can either be the name of the function as a string, or a function on its own.
3852  * @param  {object|function} [cond] A condition that must be true for the timer to play. 
3853  * This can either be a function returning a boolean, or an object with properties that have to be a certain value.
3854  * @return {baa.timer} The new timer.
3855  */
3856 baa.timerManager.newTimer = function (obj,time,mode,func,cond) {
3857 	var t;
3858 	if (typeof(obj) == "number") {
3859 		t = baa.timer.new(time,mode,obj,func,cond,this);
3860 	}
3861 	else {
3862 		t = baa.timer.new(obj,time,loop,once,this.obj,func,cond,this);
3863 	}
3864 	this.timers.push(t);
3865 	return t;
3866 }
3867 
3868 /**
3869  * Updates all the timers.
3870  */
3871 baa.timerManager.update = function () {
3872 	if (this.playing) 	{
3873 		for (var i = this.timers.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
3874 			if (this.timers[i].dead) { this.timers.splice(i,1); continue; }
3875 			this.timers[i].update();
3876 		}
3877 	}
3878 }
3879 
3880 /**
3881  *	Resumes the manager updating the timers.
3882  */
3883 baa.timerManager.play = function () {
3884 	this.playing = true;
3885 }
3886 
3887 /**
3888  * Pauses the manager from updating timers.
3889  */
3890 baa.timerManager.pause = function () {
3891 	this.playing = false;
3892 }

3896  */
3897 Timer = baa.timerManager.new();

3902 /**
3903  * A tool to make easy timers. You can make them loop, give them condiitons for playing, and make the call a function when they're done.
3904  * @see  baa.timerManager
3905  * @constructor
3906  * @param  {number} time The length of the timer in seconds.
3907  * @param  {string} [mode="normal"] If the timer should loop, die after one loop, or neither. Options: "loop", "once", "normal".
3908  * @param  {object} [obj] The object you want to connect to the condition and function of this timer.
3909  * @param  {object|function} [cond] A condition that must be true for the timer to play. 
3910  * This can either be a function returning a boolean, or an object with properties that have to be a certain value.
3911  * @param  {function|string} [func] The function you want to call each time the timer is finished.
3912  * @param  {object} [manager] The manager that owns this timer. Should only be given by the manager itself. 
3913  * This can either be the name of the function as a string, or a function on its own.
3914  */
3915 baa.timer = Class.extend("baa.timer");
3916 
3917 baa.timer.init = function (time,mode,obj,func,cond,manager) {
3918 	baa._checkType("time",time,"number");
3919 	baa._checkType("loop",loop,"boolean",null);
3920 	baa._checkType("once",once,"boolean",null);
3921 	baa._checkType("object",obj,"object",null);
3922 	baa._checkType("condition",cond,"object","function",null);
3923 	baa._checkType("function",func,"function","string",null);
3924 
3925 	this._manager = manager;
3926 	this.time = time;
3927 	this.timeStart = time;
3928 	this.condition = cond;
3929 	this.condType = typeof(this.condition);
3930 	this.mode = mode || "normal";
3931 	this.obj = obj;
3932 	this.func = func;
3933 	this.playing = true;
3934 	this.ended = false;
3935 	this.dead = false;
3936 }
3937 
3938 /**
3939  * Sets an object to this timer that will be connected with the condition and function. 
3940  * @param {object} obj The object you want to set.
3941  */
3942 baa.timer.setObject = function (obj) {
3943 	this.obj = obj;
3944 }
3945 
3946 /**
3947  * Returns the object set to this timer. If no object is set yet, it will return null.
3948  * @return {object} The object set to this timer.
3949  */
3950 baa.timer.getObject = function () {
3951 	return this.obj || (this._manager ? this._manager.getObject() : null);
3952 }
3953 
3954 /**
3955  * Sets the condition of the timer that needs to be true for it to play. This can either be a function returning a boolean, 
3956  * or an object with properties that have to be a certain value.
3957  * @param {object|function} condition The condition of the timer that needs to be true for it to play.
3958  */
3959 baa.timer.setCondition = function (condition) {
3960 	baa._checkType("condition",condition,"function","object");
3961 
3962 	this.condition = condition || function () { return true; }
3963 	this.condType = typeof(this.condition);
3964 }
3965 
3966 /**
3967  * Updates the timer.
3968  */
3969 baa.timer.update = function () {
3970 	if (this.playing && !this.dead) {
3971 		if (this.loop) {
3972 			this.ended = false;
3973 		}
3974 		if (!this.ended) {
3975 			var succes = true
3976 			var obj = this.getObject();
3977 			if (this.condition) {
3978 				if (this.condType == "object") {
3979 					for (var key in this.condition) {
3980 						if (this.condition[key] != obj[key]) {
3981 							succes = false;
3982 						}
3983 					}
3984 				}
3985 				else {
3986 					succes = this.condition(obj);
3987 				}
3988 			}
3989 				
3990 			if (succes) {
3991 				this.time -= dt;
3992 				if (this.time < 0) {
3993 					if (this.func) {
3994 						baa.util.call(this.obj,this.func)
3995 					}
3996 
3997 					this.ended = true;
3998 
3999 					if (this.once) {
4000 						this.kill();
4001 						return;
4002 					}
4003 					
4004 					if (this.loop) {
4005 						this.time += this.timeStart;
4006 					}
4007 				}
4008 			}
4009 		}
4010 	}
4011 }
4012 
4013 /**
4014  * Resets the timer, making it start from the beginning. It does not revert killing.
4015  */
4016 baa.timer.reset = function () {
4017 	this.ended = false;
4018 	this.time = this.timeStart;
4019 	this.playing = true;
4020 }

4034 }

4036 /**
4037  * Stops the timer from playing, and starts at the beginning.

4065 /**
4066  * A manager for baa.tween objects. Automatically updates and removes tweens made with it.
4067  * @constructor
4068  * @see baa.tween
4069  * @property {object} obj The object that owns this tweenmanager. Whenever you make a new tween with this tweenmanager, it will use this object.
4070  * @property {array} tweens A list of all the tweens owned by this tweenmanager.
4071  * @property {boolean} playing All the tweens will only update when this is true.
4072  * @param {object} [object] The owner of this tweenmanager.
4073  */
4074 baa.tweenManager = Class.extend("baa.tweenManager");
4075 
4076 baa.tweenManager.init = function (obj) {
4077 	this.obj = obj;
4078 	this.tweens = [];
4079 	this.playing = true;
4080 }
4081 
4082 /**
4083  * Make a new tween.
4084  * @param  {object} [obj]  The object you want to tween. If you use a number instead, 
4085  * the function will take this argument as the rate and shift all other arguments. In this case it will use the manager's object.
4086  * @param  {number} rate  How long the tween should take in seconds.
4087  * @param  {object} vars  An object with properties of the object, and the values you want them to tween to.
4088  * @param  {boolean} force Whether to overwrite properties that are already being tweened. 
4089  * If true, the tween already using these properties will have these properties removed.
4090  * @return {baa.tween}	The tween created, allowing you to extend the tween by using .to, adding a delay with .delay, or easing with .ease.
4091  */
4092 baa.tweenManager.to = function (obj,rate,vars,force) {
4093 	if (typeof(obj) == "number") {
4094 		force = vars;
4095 		vars = rate;
4096 		rate = obj;
4097 		obj = this.obj;
4098 	}
4099 
4100 	baa._checkType("force",force,"boolean",null);
4101 
4102 	var tween = baa.tween.new(obj,rate,vars,this);
4103 	tween._force = force || false;
4104 	this.tweens.push(tween);
4105 	return tween;
4106 }
4107 
4108 /**
4109  * Updates all the tweens
4110  */
4111 baa.tweenManager.update = function () {
4112 	if (this.playing) {
4113 		for (var i = this.tweens.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
4114 			if (this.tweens[i].dead) { this.tweens.splice(i,1); continue; }
4115 			this.tweens[i].update();
4116 		}
4117 	}
4118 }

4149 /**
4150  * A global tweenmanager. Useful for if you want to make quick, automatically updating, disposable tweens. You can not set a main object to this manager.
4151  */
4152 Tween = baa.tweenManager.new();
4153 
4154 /**
4155  * Making transitions of the value of properties easier. 
4156  * Make objects move from one point to another, use delay, easing, 
4157  * and call multiple tweens in a row. It is highly recommended that you use a tweenmanager.
4158  * @constructor
4159  * @param  {object} obj  The object you want to tween.
4160  * @param  {number} rate  How long the tween should take in seconds.
4161  * @param  {object} vars  An object with properties of the object, and the values you want them to tween to.
4162  * @param  {object} [manager] The manager that owns this tween. Should only be given by the manager itself.
4163  * @see baa.tweenManager
4164  */
4165 baa.tween = Class.extend("baa.tween");
4166 
4167 baa.tween.init = function (obj,rate,vars,manager) {
4168 	baa._checkType("object",obj,"object");
4169 	baa._checkType("rate",rate,"number");
4170 	baa._checkType("vars",vars,"object");
4171 
4172 	this._obj = obj;
4173 	this._rate = rate > 0 ? 1/rate : 1;
4174 	this._vars = vars;
4175 	this._manager = manager
4176 
4177 	this._delay = 0;
4178 	this._started = false;
4179 	this._progress = 0;
4180 	this._easeMode = "in";
4181 	this._easing = "linear";
4182 	this.dead = false;
4183 }
4184 
4185 /**
4186  * Updates the tween
4187  */
4188 baa.tween.update = function () {
4189 	if (this.dead) { return; };
4190 	if (this._delay > 0) { this._delay -= dt; return;};
4191 	if (!this._started) { 
4192 		this._start();
4193 		if (this.startFunc) {
4194 			baa.util.call(this.startObj,this.startFunc);
4195 		}
4196 	}
4197 	this._progress += this._rate * dt;
4198 	var p = this._progress;
4199 	p = p >= 1 ? 1 : p;
4200 	p = baa.tween.__ease(p,this._easeMode,this._easing);
4201 	for (var prop in this._vars) {
4202 		this._obj[prop] =  this._vars[prop].start + p * this._vars[prop].diff;
4203 	}
4204 	if (this.updateFunc) {
4205 		baa.util.call(this.updateObj,this.updateFunc);
4206 	}
4207 	if (this._progress >= 1) {
4208 		if (this.completeFunc) { 
4209 			baa.util.call(this.completeObj,this.completeFunc);
4210 		}
4211 		this.dead = true;
4212 		if (this._after) {
4213 			this._manager.tweens.push(this._after);
4214 		}
4215 	}
4216 }
4217 
4218 /**
4219  * Starts the tween.
4220  */
4221 baa.tween._start = function() {
4222 	//Check if there are duplicates
4223 	if (this._manager) {
4224 		for (var i = 0; i < this._manager.tweens.length; i++) {
4225 			var twn = this._manager.tweens[i];
4226 
4227 			//We only check for inited, alive tweens.
4228 			//Since this tween itself is not inited yet, we automatically check if it is itself.
4229 			if (twn._started && !twn.dead) {
4230 				//If they are the same object
4231 				if (this._obj == twn.obj) {
4232 					//Make an array of all they keys both tweens have
4233 					var same = [];
4234 					for (var key in this._vars) {
4235 						for (var key2 in twn.vars) {
4236 							if (key == key2) {
4237 								same.push(key);
4238 							}
4239 						}
4240 					}
4241 					for (var j = 0; j < same.length; j++) {
4242 						//Wh1ether we use force to overwrite it or not
4243 						if (this._force) {
4244 							delete(twn.vars[same[j]]);
4245 						}
4246 						else {
4247 							delete(this._vars[same[j]]);
4248 						}
4249 					}
4250 				}
4251 			}
4252 		}
4253 	}
4254 
4255 	for (var prop in this._vars) {
4256 		this._vars[prop] = {
4257 		start : this._obj[prop],
4258 		diff : this._vars[prop] - this._obj[prop]
4259 		};
4260 	}
4261 
4262 	this._started = true;
4263 }
4264 
4265 /**
4266  * Sets a delay to the tween
4267  * @param  {number} delay The delay you want to set in seconds
4268  * @return {baa.tween}  The tween to allow further extending.
4269  */
4270 baa.tween.delay = function (delay) {
4271 	baa._checkType("delay",delay,"number");
4272 
4273 	this._delay = delay;
4274 	return this;
4275 }
4276 
4277 /**
4278  * Sets the easing to the tween. Easing adapts the way the property transitions to its goal. 
4279  * @param  {string} easeMode If the easing should be used at the start, at the end, or both.
4280  * Options: "in", "out", "inout".
4281  * @param {string} easing The easing you want to use.
4282  * Options: "linear", "quad", "cubic", "quart", "quint", "expo", "sine", "circ", "back", "elastic"
4283  * @return {baa.tween}  The tween to allow further extending.
4284  */
4285 baa.tween.ease = function (easeMode, easing) {
4286 	baa._checkType("easeMode",easeMode,"string");
4287 	baa._checkType("easing",easing,"string");
4288 
4289 	this._easeMode = easeMode;
4290 	this._easing = easing;
4291 	return this;
4292 }
4293 
4294 /**
4295  * Sets a function that will be called when the tween starts (after the delay).
4296  * @param  {string|function} f   The function you want to have called. 
4297  * This can either be the name of the function as a string, or a function on its own.
4298  * @param  {object} [obj] The object you want to have the function called. If null, the tween's object is used instead.
4299  * @return {baa.tween} The tween to allow further extending.     
4300  */
4301 baa.tween.onStart = function (f, obj) {
4302 	baa._checkType("function",f,"function","string");
4303 	baa._checkType("object",obj,"object",null);
4304 
4305 	this.startFunc = f;
4306 	this.startObj = obj || this._obj;
4307 	return this;
4308 }
4309 
4310 /**
4311  * Sets a function that will be called every time the tween updates.
4312  * @param  {string|function} f   The function you want to have called. 
4313  * This can either be the name of the function as a string, or a function on its own.
4314  * @param  {object} [obj] The object you want to have the function called. If null, the tween's object is used instead.
4315  * @return {baa.tween} The tween to allow further extending.     
4316  */
4317 baa.tween.onUpdate = function (f, obj) {
4318 	baa._checkType("function",f,"function","string");
4319 	baa._checkType("object",obj,"object",null);
4320 
4321 	this.updateFunc = f;
4322 	this.updateObj = obj || this._obj;
4323 	return this;
4324 }
4325 
4326 /**
4327  * Sets a function that will be called when the tween ends.
4328  * @param  {string|function} f   The function you want to have called. 
4329  * This can either be the name of the function as a string, or a function on its own.
4330  * @param  {object} [obj] The object you want to have the function called. If null, the tween's object is used instead.
4331  * @return {baa.tween} The tween to allow further extending.     
4332  */
4333 baa.tween.onComplete = function(f, obj) {
4334 	baa._checkType("function",f,"function","string");
4335 	baa._checkType("object",obj,"object",null);
4336 
4337 	this.completeFunc = f;
4338 	this.completeObj = obj || this._obj;
4339 	return this;
4340 }
4341 
4342 /**
4343  * Stops the tween, killing it.
4344  */
4345 baa.tween.stop = function () {
4346 	this.dead = true;
4347 }

4349 /**
4350  * Sets the tween's progress to 1, setting properties to its final value in the next update.
4351  * @return {[type]} [description]
4352  */
4353 baa.tween.rush = function () {
4354 	this._progress = 1;
4355 }
4356 
4357 /**
4358  * Creates a new tween. This can only be done with tweens owned by a tweenmanager.  
4359  * @param  {object} obj  The object you want to tween. If this is a number instead 
4360  * the function will take this argument as the rate and shift all other arguments. In this case it will use the manager's object.
4361  * @param  {number} rate  How long the tween should take in seconds.
4362  * @param  {object} vars  An object with properties of the object, and the values you want them to tween to.
4363  * @param  {boolean} force Whether to overwrite properties that already being tweened.
4364  * @return {baa.tween}       The new tween.
4365  */
4366 baa.tween.to = function (obj, rate, vars, force) {
4367 	if (!this.manager) { throw("This function can only be called by tweens that are owned by a tweenmanager."); }
4368 	if (typeof(obj) == "number") {
4369 		force = vars;
4370 		vars = rate;
4371 		rate = obj;
4372 		obj = this._obj;
4373 	}
4374 
4375 	baa._checkType("rate",rate,"number");
4376 	baa._checkType("vars",vars,"object");
4377 	baa._checkType("force",force,"boolean",null);
4378 	
4379 	this._after = baa.tween.new(obj,rate,vars,this._manager);
4380 	this._after._force = force || false;
4381 	return this._after;
4382 }
4383 
4384 /**
4385  * Adapts progress with easing.
4386  * @param  {number} p      The progress of the tween. A number between 0 and 1.
4387  * @param  {string} easeMode  The easemode to use.
4388  * @param  {string} easing The easing type.
4389  * @return {number}        The adapted progress.
4390  */
4391 baa.tween.__ease = function (p, easeMode, easing) {
4392 	if (easing == "linear") { return p; }
4393 	if (easeMode == "out") {
4394 		p = 1 - p;
4395 		p = 1 - baa.tween["__" + easing](p);
4396 	}
4397 	else if (easeMode == "in") {
4398 		p = baa.tween["__" + easing](p);
4399 	}
4400 	else if (easeMode == "easeMode") {
4401 		p = p * 2;
4402 		if (p < 1) {
4403 			return .5 * (baa.tween["__" + easing](p));
4404 		}
4405 		else {
4406 			p = 2 - p;
4407 			return .5 * (1 - (baa.tween["__" + easing](p))) + .5;
4408 		}
4409 	}
4410 	return p;
4411 }
4412 
4413 baa.tween.__quad = function (p) {
4414 	return p * p;
4415 }
4416 
4417 baa.tween.__cubic = function (p) {
4418 	return p * p * p;
4419 }
4420 
4421 baa.tween.__quart = function (p) {
4422 	return p * p * p * p;
4423 }
4424 
4425 baa.tween.__quint = function (p) {
4426 	return p * p * p * p *p;
4427 }
4428 
4429 baa.tween.__expo = function (p) {
4430 	return Math.pow(2, (10 * (p - 1)));
4431 }
4432 
4433 baa.tween.__sine = function (p) {
4434 	return -Math.cos(p * (Math.PI * .5)) + 1;
4435 }
4436 
4437 baa.tween.__circ = function (p) {
4438 	return -(Math.sqrt(1 - (p * p)) - 1);
4439 }
4440 
4441 baa.tween.__back = function (p) {
4442 	return p * p * (2.7 * p - 1.7);
4443 }
4444 
4445 baa.tween.__elastic = function (p) {
4446 	return -(Math.pow(2,(10*(p-1)))*Math.sin((p-1.075)*(Math.PI*2)/.3));
4447 }

4482 	if (this.active) {

4486 		}
4487 
4488 
4489 		if (baa.mouse.isPressed("l")) {
4490 			if (this.buttonPlay.overlaps(baa.mouse)) {
4491 				this.playing = !this.playing;
4492 			}
4493 			else if (this.buttonRewind.overlaps(baa.mouse)) {
4494 				this.speed -= 0.25;
4495 			}
4496 			else if (this.buttonForward.overlaps(baa.mouse)) {
4497 				this.speed += 0.25;
4498 			}
4499 			else if (this.buttonHide.overlaps(baa.mouse)) {
4500 				this.hide = !this.hide;
4501 			}
4502 		}
4503 
4504 		dt = dt * this.speed;
4505 		if (!this.playing) {
4506 			dt = 0;
4507 			if (baa.mouse.isPressed("m")) {
4508 				if (this.buttonRewind.overlaps(baa.mouse)) {
4509 					dt = -ot;
4510 				}
4511 				else if (this.buttonForward.overlaps(baa.mouse)) {
4512 					dt = ot;
4513 				} 
4514 
4515 			}
4516 		}
4517 	}
4518 	else {
4519 		if (baa.keyboard.isDown(this.activeHold) && baa.keyboard.isPressed(this.activePress)) {

4521 		}

4708 baa._debug.window.update = function () {
4709 	// this.width = this.keysWidth;
4710 	// this.keysWidth = this.longestKeyWord * this.textWidth + 10;
4711 	this.longestValueLimit = Math.floor( (this.width - this.keysWidth) / this.textWidth);
4712 	this.scrollLimit = this.numberOfValues * (this.textHeightMargin+1) - (this.height - this.dataY/1.8);
4713 
4714 	if (baa.mouse.isPressed("l")) {
4715 		if (this.resizer.overlaps(baa.mouse)) {
4716 			baa.mouse.catchPressed("l");
4717 			this.resizing = true;
4718 		}
4719 		else if (this.titleBar.overlaps(baa.mouse)) {
4720 			baa.debug.focus(this);
4721 			this.moving = true;
4722 			baa.mouse.catchPressed("l");
4723 		}
4724 		else if (this.buttonBack.overlaps(baa.mouse)) {
4725 			if (this.objects.length > 0) {
4726 				this.goBackObject();
4727 			}
4728 			baa.mouse.catchPressed("l");
4729 		}
4730 		else if (this.buttonPrivate.overlaps(baa.mouse)) {
4731 			this.showPrivates = !this.showPrivates;
4732 			baa.mouse.catchPressed("l");
4733 		}
4734 		else if (this.buttonClose.overlaps(baa.mouse)) {
4735 			baa.debug.kill(this);
4736 		}
4737 	}
4738 
4739 	if (baa.mouse.isReleased("l")) {
4740 		this.resizing = false;
4741 		this.moving = false;
4742 	}
4743 
4744 	if (this.resizing) {
4745 		this.width = baa.mouse.getX() - this.x + 10;
4746 		this.height = baa.mouse.getY() - this.y + 10;
4747 		this.titleBar.width = this.width;
4748 		this.scrollHeight = 0;
4749 	}
4750 
4751 	if (this.moving) {
4752 		this.setPosition(baa.mouse.getX(),baa.mouse.getY());
4753 	}
4754 
4755 	this.resizer.x = this.x + this.width - 15;
4756 	this.resizer.y = this.y + this.height - 15;
4757 
4758 	this.editTimer += dt;
4759 	if (this.editTimer > 1.5) {
4760 		this.editTimer = 0;
4761 	}
4762 }

4828 baa._debug.window.drawData = function () {
4829 	//TODO: Zorg ervoor dat dit niet meer in draw staat. Veel shit wordt hier gemaakt
4830 	//en geupdate, wat in de update loop moet. Bovendien zorgt het voor die bug
4831 	//die er voor zorgt dat je op dingen achteraan eerst klikt. Dank u!
4832 	baa.graphics.setScissor(this.x,this.y,this.width,this.height);
4833 	var i = 0;
4834 
4835 
4836 	this.longestKeyWord = 0;
4837 
4838 	for (var key in this.obj) {
4839 		if (this.obj[key] == undefined) {
4840 			if (key == "") {
4841 				delete(this.obj[key]);
4842 			}
4843 		}
4844 		var type = typeof(this.obj[key]);
4845 		var sbstr = key.substring(0,1);
4846 		var value = this.obj[key];
4847 		var rect = baa.rect.new();
4848 		
4849 		if (type == "number") {
4850 			//We don't want long decimals.
4851 			value = Math.floor(value*100)/100;
4852 		}
4853 		else if (type == "string") {
4854 			value = '"' + value + '"';
4855 		}
4856 		else if (type == "object") {
4857 			if (Class.isClass(this.obj[key])) {
4858 				value = this.obj[key].type();
4859 			}
4860 			else if (Array.isArray(this.obj[key])) {
4861 				type = "array"
4862 				value = "Array (" + this.obj[key].length + ")";
4863 			}
4864 		}
4865 
4866 		if (type != "function" /* && this.obj[key]!=undefined */) {
4867 			if (sbstr == "_" && this.showPrivates || sbstr != "_" ) {
4868 				baa.graphics.setColor(baa.debug.types[type])
4869 				baa.graphics.setAlpha(0.8);
4870 				var y = this.getDataY(i) - 3;
4871 				rect.set(this.x,y,this.width,this.textHeightMargin);
4872 				if (y > this.y + 40 && y < this.y + this.height) {
4873 					rect.draw("fill");
4874 					if (!this.resizing) {
4875 						if (rect.overlaps(baa.mouse)) {
4876 							this.selectorY = rect.y;
4877 							if (baa.mouse.isPressed("l") || baa.mouse.isPressed("m")) {
4878 								var shouldBreak = this.clickedOnKey(key,type);
4879 								// baa.mouse.catchPressed("l");
4880 								// baa.mouse.catchPressed("m");
4881 								if (shouldBreak) {
4882 									break;
4883 								}
4884 							}
4885 						}
4886 					}
4887 					baa.graphics.setColor(255,255,255,1)
4888 					baa.graphics.print(key, this.x+10, this.getDataY(i));
4889 					if (this.editing && this.editKey == key) {
4890 						baa.graphics.print(this.editValue + (this.editTimer > 0.75 ? "_" : ""), this.x + this.keysWidth + 10, this.getDataY(i));
4891 					}
4892 					else {
4893 						baa.graphics.print("" + value, this.x + this.keysWidth + 10, this.getDataY(i));
4894 					}
4895 					this.keysWidth = Math.max(this.keysWidth,baa.graphics.getTextWidth(key) + 10);
4896 				}
4897 				i++;
4898 			}
4899 		}
4900 	}
4901 
4902 	this.numberOfValues = i;
4903 
4904 	baa.graphics.setScissor();
4905 }

4907 baa._debug.window.drawSelector = function () {
4908 	if (this.selectorY > this.y + 40) {
4909 		baa.graphics.setAlpha(0.4);
4910 		baa.graphics.setColor(255,255,255);
4911 		baa.graphics.rectangle("fill",this.x,this.selectorY,this.width,this.textHeightMargin);
4912 		baa.graphics.setAlpha(1);
4913 	}
4914 }

4916 baa._debug.window.getDataY = function (i) {
4917 	return this.y - this.scrollHeight + this.textHeightMargin * i + this.dataY;
4918 }

4927 	this.buttonBack.y = this.y + this.dataY / 2.5;

4930 	this.buttonPrivate.y = this.y + this.dataY / 2.5;

4936 baa._debug.window.mousepressed = function (button,x,y) {
4937 	if (button == "wd") {
4938 		if (this.scrollLimit > 0) {
4939 			this.scrollHeight = Math.min(this.scrollHeight + 20, this.scrollLimit);
4940 		}
4941 	}
4942 	else if (button == "wu") {
4943 		this.scrollHeight = Math.max(this.scrollHeight - 20, 0);
4944 	}
4945 }

4947 baa._debug.window.keypressed = function (key) {
4948 	if (this.editing) {
4949 		if (key == "return") {
4950 			this.confirmEdit();
4951 		}
4952 		else if (key == "escape") {
4953 			this.cancelEdit();
4954 		}
4955 		else if (this.editType == "number") {
4956 			this.pressNumber(key);
4957 		}
4958 		else if (this.editType == "string") {
4959 			this.pressString(key);
4960 		}
4961 	}
4962 	else if (key == "return") {
4963 		if (this.editKey != "") {
4964 			this.editing = true
4965 		}
4966 	}
4967 }
4968 
4969 baa._debug.window.pressNumber = function (key) {
4970 	if (!isNaN(key)) {
4971 		this.editValue = this.editValue + key;
4972 	}
4973 	else {
4974 		if (key == "backspace") {
4975 			this.editValue = this.editValue.substring(0,this.editValue.length-1);
4976 		}
4977 		else if (key == "." && this.editValue.length > 0 && this.editValue.indexOf(".") == -1 && this.editValue.indexOf("-") < this.editValue.length-1) {
4978 			this.editValue = this.editValue + ".";
4979 		}
4980 		else if (key == "-" && this.editValue.length == 0) {
4981 			this.editValue = this.editValue + "-";
4982 		} 
4983 	}
4984 }
4985 
4986 baa._debug.window.pressString = function (key) {
4987 	if (key.length == 1) {
4988 		if (baa.keyboard.isDown("shift")) {
4989 			this.editValue = this.editValue + key.toUpperCase();
4990 		}
4991 		else {
4992 			this.editValue = this.editValue + key;
4993 		}
4994 	}
4995 	else {
4996 		if (key == "backspace") {
4997 			this.editValue = this.editValue.substring(0,this.editValue.length-1);
4998 		}
4999 	}
5000 }

5003 baa._debug.window.clickedOnKey = function (key,type,pressed) {
5004 	baa.mouse.catchPressed("l");
5005 	if (type == "boolean") {
5006 		this.obj[key] = !this.obj[key];
5007 		this.cancelEdit();
5008 		return false;
5009 	}
5010 	else if (type == "number" || type == "string") {
5011 		if (key == this.editKey && this.editing) {
5012 			this.editValue = "";
5013 			return false;
5014 		}
5015 		else {
5016 			if (this.editing) { this.cancelEdit(); }
5017 
5018 			if (type == "number") {
5019 				this.editValue = "" + Math.floor(this.obj[key]*100)/100;
5020 			}
5021 			else {
5022 				this.editValue = "" + this.obj[key];
5023 			}
5024 			this.editType = type;
5025 			this.editKey = key;
5026 			this.editing = true;
5027 			this.editOriginal = this.obj[key];
5028 			return false;
5029 		}
5030 	}
5031 	else if (type == "object" || type == "array") {
5032 		if (baa.mouse.isPressed("m")) {
5033 			baa.debug.watch(this.obj[key],key);
5034 			baa.mouse.catchPressed("m");
5035 			return false;
5036 		}
5037 		else {
5038 			this.setObject(this.obj[key],key);
5039 			return true;
5040 		}
5041 	}
5042 }
5043 
5044 baa._debug.window.setObject = function (obj,name) {
5045 	this.cancelEdit();
5046 	this.editKey = "";
5047 	this.scrollHeight = 0;
5048 	this.obj = obj;
5049 	this.objects.push(obj);
5050 	this.names.push(name);
5051 }
5052 
5053 baa._debug.window.goBackObject = function () {
5054 	this.cancelEdit();
5055 	this.editKey = "";
5056 	this.scrollHeight = 0;
5057 	if (this.objects.length > 1) {
5058 		this.obj = this.objects[this.objects.length-2];
5059 		this.objects.pop();
5060 		this.names.pop();
5061 	}
5062 	else {
5063 		this.obj = this.originalObject;
5064 		this.names = [];
5065 		this.objects = [];
5066 	}
5067 }
5068 
5069 baa._debug.window.cancelEdit = function () {
5070 	if (this.editing) {
5071 		this.editing = false;
5072 		this.obj[this.editKey] = this.editOriginal;
5073 		this.editKey = "";
5074 	}
5075 }
5076 
5077 baa._debug.window.confirmEdit = function () {
5078 	if (this.editing) {
5079 		if (this.editKey != "") {
5080 			this.editing = false;
5081 			if (this.editType == "number") {
5082 				this.obj[this.editKey] = Number(this.editValue);
5083 			}
5084 			else {
5085 				this.obj[this.editKey] = this.editValue;
5086 			}
5087 		}
5088 	}
5089 }
